segments.text: Excuse me , can you do me a favor ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Where's the busiest street of this city ? I am a stranger here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You mean the seventy seventh ? It's not far from here . You can walk there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , we are so tired today . Can you tell me which bus I should take ?
segments.speaker: S1
